name: Amethyst Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who are fond of the Reef.

name: Blue Spine Shell
flavor: For Ghosts with a sharp tongue.

name: Bold Red Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who aren't afraid to make themselves a target.

name: Brave Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have been there since the beginning.

name: Competitive Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who stood with their Guardians as they became champions of the Crucible.

name: Consensus Shell
flavor: Ghosts who give testimony before the City's great Consensus often remake their shells in this traditional form.

name: Consumed Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have found a new shape.

name: Crimson Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who want a little glamour.

name: Dread Explorer Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who scouted the Dreadnaught and lived to tell the tale.

name: Foundry Shell
flavor: City's artisans welcome the deep memories and painstaking finesse of the Ghosts.

name: Frontier Shell
flavor: Tough, rugged, and defiantly colored - ready to brave the high frontier. Ghosts can self-modify at will.

name: Generalist Shell
flavor: Born from the Traveler, built of machinery and Light, the Ghost is your companion and faithful guide.

name: Intrusion Shell
flavor: Rigged for eavesdropping, surveillance, and intrusion into unfriendly networks. Ghosts can self-modify at will.

name: Iron Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who are forged in battle.

name: Ishtar Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths on Venus.

name: Joyride Shell
flavor: For Ghosts that like to feel the wind on their casings.

name: Kingslayer Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who were there when Oryx fell.

name: Mare Cognitum Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths on the Moon.

name: Meridian Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths on Mars.

name: Metropolitan Shell
flavor: For a Ghost of the Last City.

name: Pale Dawn Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who trust in the Light.

name: Purple Spine Shell
flavor: For ghosts with a "prickly" personality.

name: Pursuer Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who are always chasing the next challenge.

name: Questing Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who love adventure.

name: Redux Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who favor a new take on a classic look.

name: Scholar Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have contributed to the City's knowledge.

name: Shipwright Shell
flavor: Sometimes the best way to troubleshoot a faulty NLS drive is to dive in and get your shell dirty.

name: Skywatch Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths in the Cosmodrome.

name: Standard Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who prefer the classics.

name: Sugary Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who enjoy the sweet taste of Crucible victories.

name: Sunlit Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who believe.

name: Turquoise Shell
flavor: For Ghosts with bright personalities.

name: Vanguard Shell
flavor: This shell marks the Ghost as a trusted instrument of the Guardian Vanguard.

name: Vanguard Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have proven themselves as leaders in the field time and time again.

name: Verdant Shell
flavor: For Ghosts looking to brighten their Guardian's day.

name: Weathered Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have braved the elements.

name: Winter Sky Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who feel blue.

name: Amalgam Shell
flavor: For Ghosts whose Guardians have stood against SIVA.

name: Bellicose Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who profess allegiance to the Future War Cult.

name: Crucible Shell
flavor: For Ghosts whose Guardians have undergone Lord Shaxx's strenuous training.

name: Diaspora Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who believe that Earth is a Dead Orbit.

name: Exile Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who follow the burning path of Osiris.

name: Infection Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have come in contact with ancient powers.

name: Ironwolf Shell
flavor: For Ghosts whose Guardians have acquitted themselves beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Senator Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who envision a Last City ruled by a New Monarchy.

name: Towerwatch Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who serve the Vanguard.

name: Ghost Ghost
flavor: For Ghosts who prefer to go in disguise.

name: Deviled Ghost
flavor: For Ghosts who taste better with a sprinkle of paprika.

name: Templar Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have traveled through time and space.

name: Ascendant Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have looked into an Oversoul and lived.
